nodes.bodyText: Instead of hard coding it like this, maybe we could have a list of "ignored" namespaces? there might be more reserved namespaces in the future..

That sounds like a sensible idea!
On the other hand, we want to get this patch out ASAP, so we could refactor later, when we need to?
Agree, this makes sense soon as there will be more than one "hidden" namespace.
